#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

XyzMongoDs对mongodb java driver进行了封装，简化了编程，对于一些基本的curd工作，几乎做到不写一行代码即可完成。


= Details =

使用方法：
 *  下载xyz.mongo.core & xyz.mongo.ds.
 *   举例说明编程.

     表user结构：
 { _id:{type:'string',des:'pri key id'},_<br>
  _uName:{type:'string',des:'use name'},_<br>
  _psword:{type:'string',des:'pass word'},_<br>
  _email:{type:'string',des:'user email'},_<br>
  _role:{type:'string',des:'user roles'},_<br>
  _moduls:{type:'string',des:'moduls for user'},_<br>
  _team:{type:'int',des:'the team for user'}_<br>}
    basetable.json:
{
    findById:{
        type:"one",
        checkargs:['id'],
        value:"{_id:'${id}'}",
        fields:"{_class:0}",
        comment:"find all fields by id"
    },
    findFieldsById:{
    	type:"one",
    	checkargs:['id','names'],
    	value:"{_id:'${id}'}",
    	fields:"{<#list names as name>${name}:1,</#list>_id:0}",
    	comment:"find  field by id and field names"
    },
    listByIds:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['ids'],
    	value:"{_id:{$in:[<#list ids as id>'${id}'<#if id_has_next>,</#if></#list>]}}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"list all field by ids"
    },
    listFieldsByIds:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['ids','names'],
    	value:"{_id:{$in:[<#list ids as id>'${id}'<#if id_has_next>,</#if></#list>]}}",
    	fields:"{<#list names as name>${name}:1<#if name_has_next>,</#if></#list>}",
    	comment:"list  fields by ids and names"
    },
    findFieldById:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['id','name'],
    	value:"{_id:${id}}",
    	fields:"{${name}:1,_id:0}",
    	comment:"find  field by id and field name"
    },
    updateNumById:{
    	type:"upone",
    	checkargs:['id','name','value'],
    	value:"{_id:'${id}'}",
    	update:"{$set:{${name}:${value}}}",
    	comment:"update number field value by id and new value"
    },
    updateStrById:{
    	type:"upone",
    	checkargs:['id','name','value'],
    	value:"{_id:'${id}'}",
    	update:"{$set:{${name}:'${value}'}}",
    	comment:"update string field value by id and new value"
    },
    q:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['q'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"list all field by query"
    },
    qf:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['q','f'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{${f}}",
    	comment:"list field by query,and fields"
    },
    qc:{
    	type:"count",
    	checkargs:['q'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{_id:1}",
    	comment:"count by query"
    },
    qe:{
    	type:"exist",
    	checkargs:['q'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{_id:1}",
    	comment:"exist by query"
    },
    qo:{
    	type:"one",
    	checkargs:['q'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"find one by query"
    },
    qos:{
    	type:"one",
    	checkargs:['q','s'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"find one by query,sorts"
    },
    qfo:{
    	type:"one",
    	checkargs:['q','f'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{${f}}",
    	comment:"find one fields by query and fields"
    },
     qfos:{
    	type:"one",
    	checkargs:['q','f','s'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{${f}}",
    	comment:"find one fields by query and fields,sorts"
    },
     qs:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['q','s'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"find list by query,sorts"
    },
    qfs:{
    	type:"list",
    	checkargs:['q','f','s'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{${f}}",
    	comment:"find list by query,fields,sorts"
    },
    qp:{
    	type:"page",
    	checkargs:['q','page'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"find page by query,page"
    },
    qfp:{
    	type:"page",
    	checkargs:['q','f','page'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{${f}}",
    	comment:"find page by query,page,fields"
    },
    qps:{
    	type:"page",
    	checkargs:['q','page','s'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{}",
    	comment:"find page by query,page,sorts"
    },
    qfps:{
    	type:"page",
    	checkargs:['q','page','s','f'],
    	value:"{${q}}",
    	sorts:"${s}",
    	fields:"{${f}}",
    	comment:"find page by query,page,sorts,fields"
    }
}
